goal.ch: 修完本課程，學生應能 1. 建立基本中文表達能力，如詢問方向與地點、介紹個人興趣、休閒娛樂等； 2. 聽懂以課文架構為基礎的基本對話； 3. 認識基礎漢字並能進行簡單的對話。
goal.en: On successful completion of this course, students will be able to 1) build up the ability of expressing the basic Chinese, for example, asking direction, introducing personal hobby and leisure activities etc.; 2) understand the dialogues based on text structure; 3). recognize basic characters and conduct simple conversation.
